atk-abh03a28:2_3: kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī’’ti ‘‘sakalampi kappaṁ saṅghabhedako niraye tiṭṭhatī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi rājagirikānaṁ;
atk-abh03a28:2_4: te sandhāya kappaṭṭhoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a28:2_5: Buddho ca loketi idaṁ vinā buddhuppādena saṅghabhedassa abhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_6: Kappo ca saṇṭhāti saṅgho ca bhijjatītiādi ‘‘yadi so sakalaṁ kappaṁ tiṭṭhati,
atk-abh03a28:2_7: saṇṭhahanato paṭṭhāya taṁ kammaṁ katvā tattha uppajjitvā tiṭṭheyyā’’ti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_9: Kappaṭṭho iddhimāti pañhe bhāvanāmayaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a28:2_10: parasamaye panassa jātimayaṁ iddhiṁ icchanti, taṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a28:2_11: Chandiddhipādotiādi ‘‘jātimayāya iddhiyā iddhimāti laddhimattametaṁ, kiṁ tena, yadi panassa iddhi atthi,
atk-abh03a28:2_12: iminā nayena iddhipādā bhāvitā bhaveyyu’’nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:2_13: Āpāyiko nerayikoti suttaṁ yaṁ so ekaṁ kappaṁ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṁ kālaṁ tiṭṭheyya,
atk-abh03a28:2_14: taṁ āyukappaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a28:5_4: taṁ mahaggataṁ lokuttaraṁ vā na paṭilabhati.
atk-abh03a28:5_5: Yesaṁ pana imaṁ vibhāgaṁ akatvā aviseseneva ‘‘so kusalacittaṁ na paṭilabhatī’’ti laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a28:5_6: tesaṁ vibhāgadassanena taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a28:8_2: Tattha anantarāpayutto nāma yena khandhabhedato anantarā vipākadāyakaṁ mātughātādi ānantariyakammaṁ āṇattaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:8_3: Tattha yassa niyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṁ kammaṁ karissati,
atk-abh03a28:8_4: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya uppāditattā micchattaniyato hoti,
atk-abh03a28:8_6: Yassa aniyatāya āṇattiyā āṇatto taṁ kammaṁ karissati,
atk-abh03a28:8_7: so atthasādhikāya cetanāya anuppāditattā na micchattaniyato,
atk-abh03a28:8_8: bhabbo sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamitunti idaṁ sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:8_9: Yesaṁ pana ‘‘aniyatāyapi āṇattiyā abhabboyeva sammattaniyāmaṁ okkamitu’’nti laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a28:8_10: tesaṁ taṁ laddhiṁ bhindituṁ sakavādī pubbapakkhaṁ datvā anantarāpayuttoti paravādinā attānaṁ pucchāpeti.
atk-abh03a28:8_13: Tato paravādī mātughātādikammassa āṇattattāva ‘‘so micchattaniyato’’ti maññati.
atk-abh03a28:8_15: Sakavādī pana ekassa puggalassa dvinnaṁ niyāmānaṁ anokkantimattameva sandhāya na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a28:9_2: Aniyatampi hi āṇattiṁ payojetvā ṭhitassa ‘‘ananucchavikaṁ mayā kata’’nti kukkuccaṁ uppajjateva, vippaṭisāro jāyateva.
atk-abh03a28:9_3: Hañcītiādi kukkuccuppattimattaṁ gahetvā paravādinā laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:10_1: Idāni yassa aniyatāṇattikassāpi anantarāpayuttassa paravādinā sammattaniyāmokkamanaṁ paṭisiddhaṁ,
atk-abh03a28:10_2: tameva puggalaṁ gahetvā anantarāpayuttopuggalo abhabboti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a28:10_4: Atha naṁ sakavādī ‘‘abhabbo nāma mātughātādikammānaṁ kārako,
atk-abh03a28:10_5: kiṁ te tena tāni kammāni katānī’’ti codetuṁ mātā jīvitā voropitātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a28:10_6: Itaro tesaṁ vatthūnaṁ arogatāya tathārūpaṁ kiriyaṁ apassanto ‘‘na heva’’nti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a28:11_0: Taṁ kammaṁ paṭisaṁharitvāti aniyatāṇattikammaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:11_1: Tañhi ‘‘mā kho mayā āṇattaṁ ākāsī’’ti āṇattaṁ nivārentena paṭisaṁhaṭaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a28:11_4: Evaṁ santepi panettha purimāṇattiyāyeva niyatabhāvaṁ maññamāno paravādī ‘‘āmantā’’ti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a28:11_5: Atha naṁ sakavādī tassa kammassa paṭisaṁhaṭabhāvaṁ sampaṭicchāpetvā attano laddhiṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a28:12_1: Puna anantarāpayuttoti pariyosānapañhe paṭhamapañhe viya pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a28:12_3: paṭisaṁhaṭakālato pubbe payuttakālaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a28:12_4: Payuttapubbatāmattaṁ gahetvā aniyatāṇattivasena hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ paravādissa.
atk-abh03a28:12_5: Ayaṁ pana laddhi ayoniso patiṭṭhitattā appatiṭṭhitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a28:15_2: Tattha duvidho niyāmo – micchattaniyāmo ca ānantariyakammaṁ, sammattaniyāmo ca ariyamaggo.
atk-abh03a28:15_3: Ime dve niyāme ṭhapetvā añño niyāmo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a28:15_4: Sabbepi hi sesā tebhūmakadhammā aniyatā nāma.
atk-abh03a28:15_6: Buddhehi pana attano ñāṇabalena ‘‘ayaṁ satto anāgate bodhiṁ pāpuṇissatī’’ti byākato bodhisatto puññussadattā niyatoti vuccati.
atk-abh03a28:15_7: Iti imaṁ vohāramattaṁ gahetvā ‘‘pacchimabhaviko bodhisatto tāya jātiyā bhabbo dhammaṁ abhisametu’’nti adhippāyena ‘‘niyato niyāmaṁ okkamatī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a28:15_9: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a28:15_10: Micchattaniyatotiādi aññena niyāmena niyatassa aññaniyāmābhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:15_13: Bhabbo bodhisattoti vacanaṁ kevalaṁ bodhisattassa bhabbataṁ dīpeti, na niyatassa niyāmokkamanaṁ, tasmā asādhakaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:15_14: So hi pubbe ekenapi niyatadhammena aniyato bodhimūle saccadassanena niyāmaṁ okkantoti.
atk-abh03a28:18_1: Tattha suddhassa suddhakiccābhāvato nīvaraṇehi nivuto ophuṭo pariyonaddho ca nīvaraṇaṁ jahatīti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a28:18_2: te sandhāya nivutotipucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a28:18_3: Ratto rāgantiādi nivutassa nīvaraṇajahane dosadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:18_4: Parisuddhe pariyodātetiādi vikkhambhanavisuddhiyā visuddhassa samucchedavisuddhidassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a28:18_5: Tassa evaṁ jānatotiādi jānato passato āsavakkhayaṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a28:21_2: Tattha sammukhībhūtoti saṁyojanānaṁ sammukhībhāvaṁ tehi samaṅgībhāvaṁ upagato.
atk-abh03a28:24_5: sā cassa jhānanikanti jhānārammaṇā hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ,
atk-abh03a28:24_6: te sandhāya samāpannoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a28:24_7: Taṁ jhānaṁ tassa jhānassa ārammaṇanti pañhesu tasseva tadārammaṇataṁ apassanto suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a28:24_9: So tadassādetīti suttaṁ jhānalābhino jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānassādaṁ sādheti,
atk-abh03a28:24_10: na antosamāpattiyaṁyeva jhānanikantiyā jhānārammaṇataṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a28:27_2: Tattha ‘‘yaṁkiñci vedanaṁ vedeti sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā,
atk-abh03a28:27_3: so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadatī’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-abh03a28:27_6: Tasmā atthi asātarāgo’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a28:27_7: te sandhāya atthi asātarāgoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a28:27_8: Tattha asātarāgoti asāte dukkhavedayite ‘‘aho vata me etadeva bhaveyyā’’ti rajjanā.
atk-abh03a28:27_9: Āmantāti laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-abh03a28:28_0: 675.So taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandatīti sutte pana vinivaṭṭetvā dukkhavedanameva ārabbha rāguppatti nāma natthi,
atk-abh03a28:28_1: samūhaggahaṇena pana vedayitalakkhaṇaṁ dhammaṁ dukkhavedanameva vā attato samanupassanto diṭṭhimaññanāsaṅkhātāya diṭṭhābhinandanāya vedanaṁ abhinandati,
atk-abh03a28:28_3: dukkhāya vedanāya abhibhūto tassā paṭipakkhaṁ kāmasukhaṁ patthayantopi dukkhavedanaṁ abhinandati nāma.
atk-abh03a28:31_2: Tattha rūpataṇhā…pe… dhammataṇhāti imāsu chasu taṇhāsu yasmā sabbapacchimā taṇhā dhammataṇhāti vuttā,
atk-abh03a28:31_3: tasmā sā abyākatāti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁ;
atk-abh03a28:31_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a28:31_6: Kāmataṇhātiādīhi tīhi koṭṭhāsehi chapi taṇhā saṅkhipitvā dassitā.
atk-abh03a28:31_7: Rūpādīsu hi chasu ārammaṇesu kāmassādavasena pavattā taṇhā kāmataṇhā.
atk-abh03a28:31_8: ‘‘Bhavissati attā ca loko cā’’ti sassatadiṭṭhisahagatā taṇhā bhavataṇhā.
atk-abh03a28:31_10: Nanu sā dhammataṇhāti padaṁ taṇhāya dhammārammaṇaṁ ārabbha pavattiṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a28:34_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
